_meanings:
A figure of speech in
which one thing is represented as
being mistaken for another on 
account of the close resemblance 
between the two;  
{#BrAMtimAnanyasaMvittattulyadarSane#} <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} {#kapAle mArjAraH#}
{#paya iti karAn leQi SaSinaH#} &c.; see  
<ls>V. 3. 2</ls>; <ls>MƒÅl. 1. 2</ls> also.
